April, 2011, xml-edition;Sørensen, Viggo;dialectology;Jysk Ordbog covers the dialects of Jutland c. 1700-1920. When finished the dictionary will contain c. 55.000 lemmas (often including sublemmas). name: 1ff800ef-9632-5b41-ab78-60a44249f036
notes: Jysk Ordbog covers the dialects of Jutland c. 1700-1920. When finished the dictionary will contain c. 55.000 lemmas (often including sublemmas). The current version contains app. 16,00 entries. The word information comprises (1) pronunciation (in a simple, slightly extended Dania), (2) inflection, (3) meaning(s), (4) range, and (5) origin. Usage is shown by quotations.
title: Jysk Ordbog (a-h), 17. April, 2011, xml-edition
